@.description: Default value for `type` property which renders the template.

color.description: Text color for the field. Inherits the theme's text dark color.
Background color for the inputter field. Inherits the theme's base background color.

family.description: The font family used for inputter field. Inherits the theme's default font.

size.description: The font size used for inputter field.

block.description: Padding space above and below the inputter field text. Equal values in the block axis.

inline.description: Padding space left and right of the inputter field text. Equal values in the inline axis.

block.description: Margin space that surrounds the inputter field.

color.description: Border color of the inputter field.

size.description: Size of an icon used within the inputter field.

spacer.description: Padding space around the icon used within the inputter field.

icon.description: Icon used to open a calendar from the inputter field.
Icon used to open a drop-down selection from the inputter field.
Icon used to perform a search for data entered in the inputter field.

color.description: Background color used for multiple inputter fields.

gap.description: Gap between the multiple inputter fields.

size.description: Size of the multiple inputter fields.

color.description: Border color of the multiple inputter fields.
Label text color of inputter field.
Placeholder text color of the inputter.
Text color for the mask of the inputter. Defaults to brightened version of the darkest color.

family.description: The font family used for a maked inputter. Defaults to monospaced Courier New or Courier.

weight.description: Weight of the font used for a masked inputter.

color.description: The color of the inputter field on hover state. Defaults to a darkened version of the color.
The border color of the inputter field on hover state.
The color of the inputter field on focus state.
The border color of the inputter field on focus state.
The outline color for keyboard focus state. Defaults to theme's focus color.
The color for disabled state. Defaults to theme's disabled color.
The border color for disabled state. Defaults to theme's disabled color.
The background color for disabled state. Defaults to a brightened version of theme's disabled color.
The color for a disabled state placeholder. Defaults to theme's disabled color.

block.description: The margin space above and below the validation message. Equal values in the block axis.

gap.description: Gap between the validation message and icon.

color.description: The color indicative of a validation warning.

icon.description: The icon indicative of a validation warning.

color.description: The color of the inputter's detail.
The color for the hover state of the inputter's detail.

block.description: Margin space above and below the inputter detail's heading. Equal values in the block axis.

gap.description: Gap between the detail and content.

block.description: Margin space above and below the inputter detail's content. Equal values in the block axis.

inline.description: Padding space left and right of the inputter detail's content. Equal values in the inline axis.

size.description: Size of an icon used within the inputter detail.

open.description: Icon used to open the inputter detail's content.

close.description: Icon used to close the inputter detail's content.

position.description: Position of the inputter detail's icon. Default is start.

color.description: The outline color of the inputter detail on keyboard focus state.
The border color of the inputter detail. Defaults to a brightened version of the inputter field color.
